intent_atoms.description: Integrate FoundationUI into ISOInspectorApp gradually and phasically starting with small components.
Add FoundationUI Swift Package dependency to ISOInspectorApp target.
Create integration test suite for FoundationUI in ISOInspectorApp.
Build Component Showcase SwiftUI view for incremental UI testing.
Document FoundationUI Integration Patterns in technical spec.
Update Design System Guide with integration checklist.
ISOInspectorApp builds successfully with FoundationUI dependency.
Integration test suite structure is established.
Component Showcase renders all FoundationUI components without crashes.
Zero SwiftLint violations in the project.
Code coverage for FoundationUI integration tests is ≥80%.
Replace manual badge implementations with DS.Badge and DS.Indicator components.
All manual badges are replaced by DS.Badge.
All status indicators use DS.Indicator.
Unit test coverage for badge/indicator variants is ≥90%.
Snapshot tests pass for all light/dark modes and four status levels.
Accessibility score for badges/indicators is ≥98%.
Build time impact of badge integration is <5%.
Migrate details panel container styling to DS.Card and DS.SectionHeader components.
All container styling uses DS.Card.
All section headers use DS.SectionHeader.
No manual padding or corner magic numbers; spacing uses DS.Spacing tokens.
Dark mode is fully functional for card containers.
Snapshot regression tests pass on all platforms.
Use DS.KeyValueRow to display metadata consistently in details panel.
All metadata displayed via DS.KeyValueRow.
Consistent spacing uses DS tokens; no magic numbers.
Copyable actions integrated into key-value rows.
Test coverage for key‑value row implementation is ≥85%.
Integrate DS.CopyableText and DS.Copyable wrappers for copy functionality across platforms.
Copy works on all platforms with visual feedback.
Keyboard shortcuts (Cmd+C/Ctrl+C) function correctly.
Accessibility labels for copy actions are correct.
Apply DS.InteractiveStyle modifier to clickable rows, tree controls, and toolbar buttons.
All interactive elements have consistent feedback; macOS hover state works; iOS touch feedback visible.
No accessibility conflicts with focus management.
Use DS.SurfaceStyle environment key for surface material and elevation across app surfaces.
All surfaces use appropriate SurfaceStyle (thin, regular, thick).
Elevation hierarchy is clear visually; dark mode shadows correct.
Accessibility violations are none.
Replace manual sidebar navigation with DS.SidebarPattern for macOS/iPad.
Sidebar pattern works on macOS and iPad; file browser navigation functional.
Search/filter integrated into sidebar pattern.
iOS fallback uses NavigationStack.
Keyboard shortcuts (Cmd+1/2/3) operational on macOS.
VoiceOver and keyboard navigation fully functional.
Replace manual inspector panel layout with DS.InspectorPattern.
Fixed header sticky and functional in inspector pattern.
Scroll performance maintained.
Accessibility tests pass.
Replace manual tree view with DS.BoxTreePattern for optimized hierarchical display.
Tree renders with <16ms frame time; memory stable during expand/collapse.
Large tree (1000+ nodes) renders responsively.
Snapshot tests for tree appearance pass.
VoiceOver navigation works.
Apply DS.ToolbarPattern to top toolbar across platforms.
Toolbar layout adaptive; overflow menu functional.
Icons and labels clear; accessibility score ≥98%.
Use platform adaptation context for automatic spacing/sizing via DS.PlatformAdaptation.
Spacing correctly applied on macOS, iOS, iPadOS.
Size class adaptation respected.
Apply accessibility context for Reduce Motion, Contrast, Dynamic Type and Bold Text.
Animations respect Reduce Motion; high contrast mode fully functional.
Dynamic Type scales correctly.
Bold text accessibility setting applied.
VoiceOver narration for all interactive elements.
Keyboard navigation (Tab/Return/Escape) fully accessible.
Centralize dark mode via DS.ColorSchemeAdapter.
Zero hardcoded colors in UI code.
Dark mode rendering consistent across views.
Snapshot tests for light/dark/high-contrast.
Integrate search and filter components using DS components.
Search UI uses foundation UI components; performance <100ms for 10K boxes.
Integrate progress indicator with async parsing updates using DS.ProgressView.
Progress updates in real‑time; no freezing.
Enhance export functionality with foundation UI patterns.
Export modal uses foundation UI design system; all format options functional.
Improve hex viewer with foundation typography and copyable data.
Hex viewer uses DS typography; performance <50ms render time.

functional_units.name: FoundationUI Dependency Integration
functional_units.description: Adds FoundationUI Swift package as a dependency to ISOInspectorApp target and verifies build.

functional_units.name: Integration Test Suite Setup
functional_units.description: Creates structured integration test directories for FoundationUI components.

functional_units.name: Component Showcase View
functional_units.description: Builds a SwiftUI view that renders all FoundationUI components for development and testing.

functional_units.name: Foundation Components Wrappers - Badge & Status Indicators
functional_units.description: Wraps DS.Badge and DS.Indicator into BoxStatusBadgeView and ParseStatusIndicator for badge/indicator usage.

functional_units.name: Foundation Components Wrappers - Card Containers & Sections
functional_units.description: Wraps DS.Card and DS.SectionHeader into BoxDetailsCard and BoxSectionHeader for container styling.

functional_units.name: Foundation Components Wrappers - Key-Value Rows
functional_units.description: Wraps DS.KeyValueRow into BoxMetadataRow for metadata display with copyable action.

functional_units.name: Copyable Text Wrapper
functional_units.description: Integrates DS.CopyableText and DS.Copyable wrappers for text fields, hex viewer addresses, and provides platform shortcuts.

functional_units.name: Interactive Style Modifier Application
functional_units.description: Applies DS.InteractiveStyle to clickable rows, tree controls, and toolbar buttons for consistent hover/press feedback.

functional_units.name: Surface Material Styling
functional_units.description: Uses DS.SurfaceStyle environment key to apply surface styles (.thin,.regular,.thick) across UI surfaces.

functional_units.name: Sidebar Pattern Implementation
functional_units.description: Replaces manual sidebar with DS.SidebarPattern via BoxesSidebar view, including search/filter integration and platform shortcuts.

functional_units.name: Inspector Pattern Implementation
functional_units.description: Applies DS.InspectorPattern in BoxInspector for details panel layout with sticky header and scroll behavior.

functional_units.name: Tree Box Pattern Implementation
functional_units.description: Wraps DS.BoxTreePattern into BoxTree view, enabling lazy rendering, animations, selection, and large‑tree performance.

functional_units.name: Toolbar Pattern Implementation
functional_units.description: Uses DS.ToolbarPattern to arrange toolbar buttons adaptively across macOS/iOS platforms.

functional_units.name: Platform Adaptation Context Setup
functional_units.description: Provides DS.PlatformAdaptation environment context for automatic spacing/sizing per platform and size class.

functional_units.name: Accessibility Context Integration
functional_units.description: Applies DS.AccessibilityContext to respect Reduce Motion, High Contrast, Dynamic Type, Bold Text, and VoiceOver settings.

functional_units.name: Dark Mode Adapter Implementation
functional_units.description: Centralizes dark mode handling via DS.ColorSchemeAdapter and replaces hard‑coded colors with design system tokens.

functional_units.name: Search & Filter UI Components
functional_units.description: Creates BoxSearchView and BoxFilterView using FoundationUI typography/spacing for search functionality.

functional_units.name: Progress View Integration
functional_units.description: Builds BoxParsingProgressView that displays live parsing progress using DS.ProgressView and async streams.

functional_units.name: Export Modal Implementation
functional_units.description: Provides BoxExportView modal with format selection, share sheet integration, and accessibility support.

functional_units.name: Hex Viewer Enhancement
functional_units.description: Enhances hex viewer with DS.Typography, copyable rows, byte highlighting, and performance optimizations.

functional_units.name: Full App Integration Test Suite
functional_units.description: Creates comprehensive end‑to‑end tests covering launch, navigation, search, export, dark mode, accessibility, platform behavior, performance, and visual regression.

functional_units.name: Performance Validation Tests
functional_units.description: Measures app launch time, tree rendering, scroll FPS, memory usage, binary size impact to ensure performance budgets are met.

functional_units.name: Documentation & Migration Guide
functional_units.description: Updates technical spec, migration guide, integration guide, API docs, and component showcase examples for the new FoundationUI wrappers.
